name: Alex Thompson
text: Nadeem's AI voice agents completely transformed our lead qualification process. We reduced manual calls by 70% and saw a 2x increase in qualified appointments.

name: Sarah Jenkins
text: The chatbot network Nadeem built for our patient support system is incredible. 50+ bots handling inquiries 24/7 with zero downtime. Highly recommended!

name: Michael Chen
text: Exceptional work on the RAG pipeline. Nadeem clearly understands how to make LLMs efficient and accurate for business data.
